text: He imana vali'o! Apani kama'i vicom sabha tom cagi ciza nu kharaca karo ate usa vicom jo asim tuhade la'i dharati ute paida kita hai. Bekara cizam da irada na karo ki usa vicom kharaca karo. Halanki tusim khuda vi inham nu laina vale nahim siva'e isa de ki anadekhi kara ja'u. Jana la'u ki alaha bepravaha hai. Khubi'am vala hai
